title: how to boot client to legacy client automatically
body: new client is garbage just fuck my shit up my computer cant even handle that launch

replies.body:
The only *reliable* way to launch the Legacy Client by default at the moment is to reinstall the client entirely using [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) and to deny any options to upgrade to the Beta again. Bear in mind that this will only be an option while the Beta Client is unfinished. Eventually it will be mandatory, but I'm confident we'll have the quirks worked out by then! :)

Let me know if you have any other questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=6Hh2OxoE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-17T00:38:48.155+0000)
>
> ... Bear in mind that this will only be an option while the Beta Client is unfinished. Eventually be mandatory...

1. does this mean the legacy client will be removed?
2. will the finished Beta Client include all the currently missing features before it becomes mandatory?
3. is there any ETA on when that might happen?

Our [**latest Ask Riot**](http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2016/12/ask-riot-the-future-of-the-client-update/) actually dives into detailed answers for these questions and features input from our development teams, so I strongly recommend checking it out.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
